summary.text:
# Apify Client for Python
Apify Client for Python is a library for controlling your actors on the Apify Platform from Python. It is a thin wrapper around the [Apify API](https://docs.apify.com/api/v2). The library is available on [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/apify-client/) and can be installed using `pip install apify-client`.
